title: ALG OUT ULTRA 3 IN 1
long_description: ALG OUT ULTRA 3 IN 1 destroys and prevents the formation of algae in pool water. This innovative algaecide comes in a long-lasting pre-dosed solid format that’s both safe and easy to use and store. ALG OUT ULTRA 3 IN 1 treats a wide variety of algae (green, yellow and black). Once dissolved in water, its unique concentrated formula also improves filtration and helps to maintain water temperature.
short_description: BENEFITS Kills algae in pool water Improves filtration Helps to maintain water temperature FORMAT 8 x 100 g

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Bathing is possible right after applying the product.

dosage.specifications: Initial dosage for pool water having no visible algae is 28 g of ALG OUT ULTRATM 3 IN 1 per 10,000 L of pool water. Routine dosage (every week) is 14 g of ALG OUT ULTRATM 3 IN 1 per 10,000 L of pool water. For visible algae, when superchlorination is not employed, add 70 g of ALG OUT ULTRATM 3 IN 1 per 10,000 L of pool water.

warning: DO NOT place directly in pool. DO NOT apply when swimmers are in the pool.
